basic.Source: Ganoderma lucidum (Ling zhi medicinal fungus) (Bracket fungus)
basic.Target Organism: Fungi:Fusarium oxysporum (MIC=20 µg/ml), Penicillium chrysogenum (MIC=35 µg/ml), Aspergillus niger (MIC=50 µg/ml), Cladosporium musae (MIC=60 µg/ml), Botrytis cinerea (MIC=65 µg/ml), Trichophyton rubrum (MIC=65 µg/ml), T. tonsurans (MIC=20 µg/ml), T. interdigitale (MIC=20 µg/ml), Epidermophyton floccosum (MIC=15 µg/ml), Microsporum canis (MIC=70 µg/ml).
